text.autoconfig.chargedjump.title: ChargedJump Config
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.charg: Should particles spawn while the jump is charging?
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.coold: How many ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) you need to sprint before the jump is ready.
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.charg: How fast you will run while charging the jump.
